articles.description: The psychologist accused the Spurs of not protecting her after Primo, now a free agent, repeatedly exposed himself to her.
articles.content:
Joshua Primo remains a free agent after allegations he repeatedly exposed himself to a former Spurs team psychologist. (Photo by Megan Briggs/Getty Images)
Former San Antonio Spurs team psychologist… [+2554 chars]
